[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    If(
        IfStatement {
            if: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            condition: Parenthesized {
                left_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    4,
                ),
                inner: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                5,
                            ),
                            name: "$foo",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    9,
                ),
            },
            body: Statement {
                statement: Block(
                    Braced {
                        left_brace: Span(
                            3,
                            11,
                        ),
                        inner: [],
                        right_brace: Span(
                            5,
                            1,
                        ),
                    },
                ),
                elseifs: [],
                else: Some(
                    IfStatementElse {
                        else: Span(
                            5,
                            3,
                        ),
                        statement: If(
                            IfStatement {
                                if: Span(
                                    5,
                                    8,
                                ),
                                condition: Parenthesized {
                                    left_parenthesis: Span(
                                        5,
                                        11,
                                    ),
                                    inner: Variable(
                                        SimpleVariable(
                                            SimpleVariable {
                                                span: Span(
                                                    5,
                                                    12,
                                                ),
                                                name: "$bar",
                                            },
                                        ),
                                    ),
                                    right_parenthesis: Span(
                                        5,
                                        16,
                                    ),
                                },
                                body: Statement {
                                    statement: Block(
                                        Braced {
                                            left_brace: Span(
                                                5,
                                                18,
                                            ),
                                            inner: [],
                                            right_brace: Span(
                                                7,
                                                1,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ),
                                    elseifs: [],
                                    else: None,
                                },
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            },
        },
    ),
]
